greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 1, k >= 1, read by antidiagonals, where A(n,k) is the number of lines through at least 2 points of an n X k grid of points.
link: S. Mustonen, On lines and their intersection points in a rectangular grid of points
Seppo Mustonen, On lines and their intersection points in a rectangular grid of points [Local copy]
xref: Main diagonal gives A018808. Reading up to the diagonal gives A107348.
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Nov 26 2017
